import "./navabar.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useAuth } from "../../hooks/context/auth-context"; import { useEffect } from "react"; export default function NavBar() { const {authState,dispatch}=useAuth(); const tokens=localStorage.getItem("userToken"); useEffect(()=>{ const data=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("userData")); if(tokens){ dispatch({type:"SET_USER",payload:data}); } dispatch({type:"SET_USER",payload:{}}); },[]) const logoutHandler=()=>{ localStorage.removeItem("userToken"); localStorage.removeItem("userData"); dispatch({type:"SET_USER",payload}) } return (
